snippet.title: Deviator - Exclusive Release Date Announcement & Gameplay Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out the Deviator release date trailer, announcing that the 2D hand-drawn Metroidvania game from Gami Studio will be released on August 2, 2024 in Steam Early Access (PC). We also get an exclusive look at some new Deviator gameplay. Get a peek at some exploration, platforming, and how combat works in this teaser.

Traverse mysterious cities and uncharted wilds, encounter a variety of strange creatures, and uncover the secrets in a chaotic world. Deviator centers around the mechanics of parrying and deflecting, so hold your nerve and use your skills to vanquish anything that stands in your way.

#Deviator #Gaming #IGN
